channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Amar Shinde

item.title: Aspect Based Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Aspect-based sentiment analysis is a text analysis technique that breaks down text into aspects (attributes or components of a product or service), and then allocates each one a sentiment level (positive, negative or neutral). Github Respository Link

item.title: Captcha Solver
item.description: While Scrapping amazon website there was a frequent checks of captcha so it slows down the process so with the help of deep learning algorithms the captcha solving was made. Github Respository Link

item.title: Consumer Complaints Resolution
item.description: Consumer complaint resolution is important to any business. In this particular case the dataset have been given detailed consumer complaints along with whether consumer disputed with the conclusion. If we are able to predict this,consumer who is more likely to dispute a conclusion can be given more attention as to how the complaints are handled as well as how persuasively the final conlusions are conveyed to them. Github Respository Link

item.title: Melbourne House Prediction
item.description: Designed a model for House price prediction and compared the various models like Xgboost, Gradient Boosting Regression model, Lasso Regression model, Random Forest Model with Linear Regression model. Github Respository Link

item.title: Multi Label Image Classification
item.description: Multi-label classification and the strongly related problem of multi-output classification are variants of the classification problem where multiple labels may be assigned to each instance. Multi-label classification is a generalization of multiclass classification, which is the single-label problem of categorizing instances into precisely one of more than two classes; in the multi-label problem there is no constraint on how many of the classes the instance can be assigned to. Github Respository Link

item.title: Sentiment Analysis For Instagram
item.description: Sentiment analysis on the people caption post in Instagram was done with the help of the text preprocessing and using some NLP techniques. Github Respository Link

item.title: To Mail or Not to Mail
item.description: Direct mailings to a company’s potential customers – “junk mail” to many – can be a very effective way for them to market a product or a service. However, as we all know, much of this junk mail is really of no interest to the people that receive it. Most of it ends up thrown away, not only wasting the money that the company spent on it,but also filling up landfill waste sites or needing to be recycled.

item.title: Website with django
item.description: There are different sources for getting information on technologies and other stuff so website made on the basis of the web scrapping from multiple platform to display on the one platform. Github Respository Link

item.title: Yoga Poses Estimation
item.description: End-to-End Deep learning model with the help of the TensorFlow library for tracking the human poses from video, images, and webcam and made detection of yoga poses from the video feed and store the sub clip part of the video feed.
